descriptionHtml:
DOWNLOAD the playable File HERE:Â http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84010/?


Just hoping to show what I've worked on for the last few months, hoping people will track. These are only screenshots as it is not yet in a playable state, but so far I have 2 world spaces with about 5 dungeons and one large interior for the Temple. There is the main town and a small village on a plateau, as well as a few jungle areas and a sunken tomb.

I will come up with a full list of credits for assets used so far once I get a playable version up, but off the top of my head it uses assets by Mr.Siika, Phitts sheogorad rec, Strotis Rec, Tamira's plant rec. This will not be going on steam workshop only Nexus. I just wanted to see if people would be interested in playing something like this as i ran out of steam on it and have started thinking about getting it going again. I am not looking to form a team but If you would like your assets featured please feel free to contact me about permissions and credits. Thank you for taking an interest in Akavir!

To be done before BETA:
-finalize existing dungeons
-Add merchants and npc's to towns
-Navmeshing
-Finalize exterior to existing worldspaces


A few unique locales I hope to include after beta would be
1) a castle being fought over by the Tsaesci-Kapotun
2) a player home of some description
3) the ability to export unique goods to Skyrim (for all you merchants out there.)


Far, FAR futur plans:(AKA probably not till after ES6)
-one or more new worldspaces depicting a jungle and desert setting
-A battle with Tsaesci Navy
author: Kyman3
